author: Jamie Boudreau
description: Overdo the smoke and your cocktail will start to resemble a cigar. Too little and you may find a tad sweet.
name: Machine Head
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum

recipeInstructions.text: POUR all ingredients except tea into mixing glass
SMOKE tea using a chefs smoker and direct smoke into mixing glass
Cover to capture smoke for a minute or so
Remove cover, STIR with ice and strain into chilled glass
